author: James Freeman
title: Waffle House Hero - WSJ
text:
Just a few days after airline passengers witnessed another inspiring example of the stouthearted professionals trained by the U.S. military, along comes an everyday hero who says his only combat training is wrestling his daughter to bed. 

In the early hours of Sunday morning in Antioch, Tennessee, James Shaw Jr. disarmed and then ejected a shooter from a Waffle House restaurant where the assailant had shot four people to death. As the community mourns, the Metropolitan Nashville Police Department reports that it has arrested... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
